reviews.review: if you like russians screaming at you this is the perfect game

Best Team-FPS-Game. I love the opprtunity of adding stickers to weapon skins. Every item can then be very individual and there are a lot of symbiotic ways of crafting colors, structures or even theme related skins. It is not very beginner friendly but the learning curve is very satisfying. It is a pleasure to meet polite and more experienced from game to game. Just try to not get tilted by the game itself or toxic players and this game can become a real passion.
